  'fob',
  'kys',

function checkForBadWords(input) {
  for (const word of badWordsArray) {
    if (input.includes(word)) {
      return true; // bad word detected
    }
  }
  return false; // No bad words detected
}

function validateInput() {
  const userInput = document.getElementById('newHighScoreInput').value;
  if (checkForBadWords(userInput)) {
    return false;
  } else {
    return true;
  }
}

export { validateInput };
